name: Loop Balls
description:
Loop Balls is a playful arcade game for Android!
Now you can play with friends!

Drag your finger to move the bar and bounce the balls into the basket!
Repeat this action, Let the loop machine work!

Tips:
◉ Take note of random appear props, they can add new power for your looping machine!
◉ Double the size to double the score!
◉ Each color upgrade, the score is +1!

Loop Balls is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now become the master of the loop machine!
